name: The Dream Maker
description:
The Dream Maker is a game made for the 2019 GMTK Game Jam. Its a short visual novel with multiple endings that puts you in the role of an A.I. that must communicate between the  two last people alive after a devastating incident on the last space station in existence.  It's up to you to decide how to relay the dialogue between the two crew members and to figure out what really caused the explosion responsible for killing the rest of the crew. 

Will you tell the truth?

Will Inject your opinion?

Will you modify some one else's words?

Time is running out. How will this story end?

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Development for this game took a little over two days to complete and there for wasn't ready in time for the Game Jam. 

Developed By-

Programming: Joseph Bramlett & Edward Portman

Art: Joseph Bramlett

Script: Joseph Bramlett & Bea Veress
